issue.title: [Python] Support for MapType with Fields
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13696](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13696). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Ability to create a [MapType](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.map_.html) object passing Field types instead of DataTypes for the key_type and item_type arguments.  Something similar to what is possible for [ListType](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.list_.html#pyarrow.list_) in python or what seems to be possible from the [cpp implementation of MapType](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/type.cc#L424) (untested).
